name: Birdo's Disorder
description:
Take control of Birdo the parrot as you navigate through a hellish world, filled with puzzles and thrillers!

Avoid the lurching walls, as well as illusions that may pose a threat to your mission.

Beat the game? Go back, and try to find each of the passwords!

Complete both bonus stages to unlock all passwords!!

This game is the successor to Birdo and Spades. Prior knowledge of the series is not required for this game.
